title: Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. Announces New Marketing Campaign
text:
Ovation Music & Studios, Inc.
BOCA RATON, Florida , October 22,
Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. (PINKSHEETS: OVMS) (the "Company") announces today that it has begun a new marketing campaign around its hub locations.
Ovation Music & Studios, http://ovationmusicstudios.com/index.php , announces that it has begun the roll out of its new marketing campaign designed to attract music education students young and old, https://www.facebook.com/Ovationmusicstudios .
Ovation has put into motion its marketing plan that includes using TV ads in target markets on specific networks. A market plan has been devised to attract a demographic that includes beginning musicians in a school age audience of 8-15, as well as more advanced players in the 16 and up age range as well as more seasoned players to play in the advanced Rock Shop™ and Jazz Jam™ ensembles. All Ovation students and musicians are able to take part in the Rock Shop™ and Jazz Jam™ programs.
With its current expansion into the Nashville, TN market with the Gallatin, TN location Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. is exploring additional locations in the South Florida and Nashville, Tennessee market.
"We've just begun to expand our marketing approach as we prepare for expansion, starting in Gallatin, TN , which will lead into future franchising and licensing opportunities around the South Florida and Tennessee locations," stated CEO, Keith De Tone .
About Ovation Music & Studios, Inc .
Ovation Music & Studios, Inc. is a music education company that provides individual and group lessons, rehearsal studios, professional recording studios, and live performances with its Rock Shop™ and Jazz Jam™ ensembles. Ovation Music & Studios is developed for students of all ages. Their unique method provides professional musicians and teachers in one-to-one voice and instrument lessons. When the students have developed skill in the instrument as well as in music theory and ear training they are combined into rock bands and/or jazz ensembles which perform in public venues.
